tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SpendData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE spend_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  category VARCHAR,
  vendor VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE opportunities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR,
  description TEXT,
  savings_estimate DECIMAL,
  status ENUM('open', 'approved', 'implemented')
);
